parameters: \nc<Senpai>Did you have fun? Then, get ready for overtime.
\bustMsgExp[2, 1]\nc<Senpai>What did you do at the logistics company today?
\bustMsgExp[2, 0]\nc<Senpai>I see. So that's how Saki repays a favor...
\bustMsgExp[1, 2]\nc<Saki>(Ugh, something feels off... Maybe I'm just out of shape?)
